name: Framer Copy Paste
description:
Quickly turn your Figma designs into an interactive experience


Export layers from Figma and paste them right into Framer with this plugin. Run the plugin on the screen you want to import, paste in Framer, and you are ready to go! 


The importer fully automates the details of converting Figmaâ€™s document structure to real DOM layout. A few highlights:


  • Preserves the original layer hierarchy
  • Supports pinning and auto-layout
  • Handles image filter effects
  • Imports vector and compound shapes as SVGs
  • Imports diamond and angular gradients as PNGs


TO GET STARTED:

  1. Sign up for a Framer account: https://login.framer.com/sign-up/
  2. Install the plugin in Figma Desktop app and run it on the screen you desire to export it
  3. In a Framer Project, paste the screen
  4. Your screen will be imported and ready to go!


Resources

  • Getting your designs from Figma into Framer


If you have any questions, join our Figma channel in the Framer Discord
